text: Digau Canaan ne mmada gi digaula e tangitangi i Atad, ga helekai, “Taumaha tangihangi damanaiee dela e hai go digau Egypt!” Deelaa ne hidi ai di gowaa deelaa ga haga ingoo bolo “Abel Mizraim”.50.11 Abel Mizraim: di ingoo deenei le e hai dono lee be telekai Hebrew boloo, “Hangihangi o digau Egypt”
